import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Icons } from '../images/Icons' import { Component } from 'react' import { gsap } from 'gsap' import AddAPhotoIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AddAPhoto'; const { useEffect, useRef } = React const Profile = () => { const hiddenFileInput = React.useRef(null); const formOpening = useRef() const q = gsap.utils.selector(formOpening) const handleClick = () => { hiddenFileInput.current.click(); } const handleChange = event => { const fileUploaded = event.target.files[0]; }; const formHandleClick = () => { useEffect(() => { gsap.to(q('.work-submit-form'), { width: '60%' }) }, []) } return (
